Property.name: Death Style
Property.HelpText: Nothing: Chao remains after explosion. Temporary: Chao is removed until Garden is reloaded. Perminant: Chao are IRREVERSIBLY deleted from your Save File after they explode.

Property.name: Play Jingle
Property.HelpText: Plays "chao_g_dead.adx" when a chao explodes.

Property.name: Chain Explosions
Property.HelpText: Whether a Chao hit by an explosion will be put into the Damaged state. This has a chance to create additional explosions.
